description: Reads information from the CAN BUS and stores it in a SQLite db

targets.queryText:
WITH converted AS (
   SELECT date, 
   CAST(Amps as float) as Amps,
   BatteryCapacity,
   BatteryCutoffVoltage,
   BmsTemperatureHigh,
   BmsTemperatureLow,
   CellVoltageDelta,
   CellVoltageHigh,
   CellVoltageLow,
   ChargeCurrentLimit,
   ChargeCurrentLimitMax,
   ChargeVoltage,
   CurrentLimit,
   DischargeLimit,
   FullChargedRestingVoltage,
   StateOfCharge,
   StateOfHealth,
   Temperature,
   Voltage,
   Watts 
   FROM BmsReadings
)
SELECT date, Amps,
BatteryCapacity,
BatteryCutoffVoltage,
BmsTemperatureHigh,
BmsTemperatureLow,
CellVoltageDelta as BMSCellD,
CellVoltageHigh  as BMSCellH,
CellVoltageLow as BMSCellL,
ChargeCurrentLimit,
ChargeCurrentLimitMax,
ChargeVoltage,
CurrentLimit as BMSCurrLimit,
DischargeLimit,
FullChargedRestingVoltage,
StateOfCharge,
StateOfHealth,
Temperature,
Voltage,
Watts
FROM converted WHERE date BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}

targets.queryText:
WITH converted AS (
   SELECT date,
   CAST(BatteryCurrent as float) as BatteryCurrent,
   BatteryVoltage,
   CellVoltageDelta,
   CellVoltageHigh,
   CellVoltageLow,
   ChargedTotal,
   CurrentLimit,
   Cycles,
   DischargedTotal,
   StateOfCharge,
   StateOfHealth,
   TemperatureMos,
   TemperatureOne,
   TemperatureTwo
   FROM BatteryReadings where SlaveNumber = 0
) 
SELECT date,
BatteryCurrent as B1Curr,
BatteryVoltage as B1Volt,
CellVoltageDelta as B1CellD,
CellVoltageHigh as B1CellH,
CellVoltageLow as B1CellL,
ChargedTotal as B1CHTot,
CurrentLimit as B1CurrLmt,
Cycles as B1Cycles,
DischargedTotal as B1DCHTot,
StateOfCharge as B1SOC,
StateOfHealth as B1SOH,
TemperatureMos as B1TMos,
TemperatureOne as B1T1,
TemperatureTwo as B1T2

FROM converted WHERE date BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} AND ${__to:date:seconds}
